messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Loosing Baby Teeth
messages.msgSnippet: Corallyn-I don t know what the average is, but I didn t start losing teeth until I was 7 and it s been the same with my kids and many of my nieces and nephews
messages.messageBody:
Corallyn-I don't know what the average is, but I didn't start losing teeth
until I was 7 and it's been the same with my kids and many of my nieces and
nephews also.

---Valerie

PS Does this have anything to do with the Waldorf belief of starting
reading/writing?
---------------------------------------------------------------------_->

Okay I feel really foolish asking this because I know the answer but
DH doesn't agree. Anyway, isn't 5-6 years the normal age when
children start loosing their baby teeth? Corallyn
